content:
## n8n@0.101.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.100.0...n8n@0.101.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2021-01-07 - New nodes - Google Analytics - PhantomBuster - Enhanced nodes - AWS: Added support for custom endpoints - Gmail: Added an option to send messages formatted as HTML - Philips Hue: Added Room/Group name to Light name to make it easier to identify lights - Slack: Added ephemeral message option - Telegram: Removed the Bot resource as the endpoint is no longer supported - Bug fixes - E-goi: Fixed the name of the node - Edit Image: Fixed an issue with the Border operation - HTTP Request: Fixed batch sizing to work when `batchSize = 1` - PayPal: Fixed a typo in the Environment field - Split In Batches: Fixed a typo in the description - Telegram: Fixed an issue with the Send Audio operation - Based on your settings, vacuum runs on SQLite on startup - Updated Axios to version `0.21.1`
